summary: A woman is tormented by strange dreams of astronauts on the moon. She visits a deserted seaside town whose inhabitants know her even though she does not know them.
cast: Florinda Bolkan|Peter McEnery|Nicoletta Elmi|Caterina Boratto|John Karlsen|Esmeralda Ruspoli|Evelyn Stewart|Miriam Acevedo|Rosita Torosh|Luigi Antonio Guerra|Klaus Kinski|Lila Kedrova|Bruno Degni|Franco Magno|Lidia Zanussi|Luciano Zanussi|Feridun Çölgeçen
title: Huellas de pisadas en la luna
